statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_type, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT quantity, equipment_type FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_type = 'computer' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT equipment_type, quantity FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT equipment_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM equipment_inventory GROUP BY equipment_type HAVING total_quantity > 50
SELECT equipment_type, team_id, last_updated FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY equipment_type ASC, last_updated DESC
SELECT DISTINCT equipment_type FROM equipment_inventory
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_type, team_id, quantity, last_updated FROM equipment_inventory WHERE team_id = 3
SELECT team_name FROM teams
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE item_quantity > 0
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY item_quantity DESC
SELECT team_name, item_name FROM teams JOIN inventory ON teams.team_id = inventory.team_id
SELECT * FROM teams INNER JOIN inventory ON teams.team_id = inventory.team_id
SELECT team_name FROM teams;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY item_quantity DESC;
SELECT team_name, item_name, item_quantity FROM teams JOIN inventory ON teams.team_id = inventory.team_id;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(item_name) AS total_items FROM teams LEFT JOIN inventory ON teams.team_id = inventory.team_id GROUP BY team_name HAVING COUNT(item_name) > 0;
SELECT * FROM balls;
SELECT ball_id, ball_color FROM balls WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY ball_type DESC;
SELECT ball_type, quantity FROM balls WHERE ball_color = 'Red';
SELECT ball_color, COUNT(ball_id) AS total_balls FROM balls GROUP BY ball_color;
SELECT AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM balls WHERE ball_type LIKE '%basketball%';
SELECT * FROM balls ORDER BY ball_color DESC, ball_type;
SELECT ball_type, ball_color, quantity FROM balls WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT ball_type, ball_color, quantity FROM balls WHERE ball_color = 'Red' AND quantity < 5 ORDER BY ball_type ASC;
SELECT ball_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM balls GROUP BY ball_type;
SELECT * FROM balls WHERE ball_color IN ('Red', 'Blue', 'Green') AND quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM balls;
SELECT ball_name, ball_id FROM balls;
SELECT team_name, ball_name FROM teams INNER JOIN balls ON teams.ball_id = balls.ball_id;
SELECT team_name, uniform_color FROM teams INNER JOIN uniforms ON teams.uniform_id = uniforms.uniform_id;
SELECT * FROM uniforms WHERE uniform_color='red';
SELECT * FROM balls WHERE ball_id = 1;
SELECT ball_name FROM balls ORDER BY ball_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, ball_name, net_type FROM teams JOIN balls ON teams.ball_id = balls.ball_id JOIN nets ON teams.net_id = nets.net_id;
SELECT * FROM uniforms WHERE uniform_color = 'Red' ORDER BY uniform_id;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS num_players FROM teams GROUP BY team_name HAVING num_players > 5;
SELECT * FROM balls
SELECT name, color FROM balls WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT id, type, size FROM nets ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT team_id, color, size FROM uniforms WHERE team_id = 1

SELECT e.id, t.name AS team_name, t.city, b.name AS ball_name, b.color AS ball_color, q.quantity AS ball_quantity FROM equipment_inventory e JOIN teams t ON e.team_id = t.id JOIN balls b ON e.ball_id = b.id JOIN (SELECT ball_id, SUM(quantity) AS quantity FROM equipment_inventory GROUP BY ball_id) q ON e.ball_id = q.ball_id WHERE e.team_id = 1 ORDER BY b.name ASC
SELECT id, name, color, quantity FROM balls ORDER BY color DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT team_id, color, size FROM uniforms WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY team_id
SELECT * FROM teams WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT id, size, quantity FROM nets WHERE size LIKE '%XL%'
SELECT team_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM equipment_inventory GROUP BY team_id HAVING total_quantity > 100
